Texts.Chs: 幻影
Texts.Eng: Effigium

Texts.Chs: 寒霜
Texts.Eng: Isogen

Texts.Chs: 永燃
Texts.Eng: Pyreite

Texts.Chs: xithricite
Texts.Eng: X晶体

Texts.Chs: 原体
Texts.Eng: Protocite

Texts.Chs: 半影
Texts.Eng: Penumbrite

Texts.Chs: 寂灭
Texts.Eng: quietus

Texts.Chs: 海藻
Texts.Eng: Algae

Texts.Chs: 腐化生物质
Texts.Eng: Corruption

Texts.Chs: 重金属
Texts.Eng: Densinium

Texts.Chs: 骨化石
Texts.Eng: Bone

Texts.Chs: 血钻
Texts.Eng: Blood Diamond

Texts.Chs: 铱
Texts.Eng: Irradium

Texts.Chs: 月形
Texts.Eng: Lunari Crystal

Texts.Chs: 镎
Texts.Eng: Neptunium

Texts.Chs: 钍
Texts.Eng: Thorium

Texts.Chs: 熔点
Texts.Eng: Zerchesium

Texts.Chs: 月石
Texts.Eng: Moonstone

Texts.Chs: 晶体
Texts.Eng: Prism Shard

Texts.Chs: 原力
Texts.Eng: Trianglium

Texts.Chs: 钚
Texts.Eng: Plutonium

Texts.Chs: 铀
Texts.Eng: Uranium

Texts.Chs: 朱砂
Texts.Eng: Cinnabar

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#008aff;潮汐星球。^reset;表面覆盖着锋利的珊瑚礁，穗状的石头，还发现了^orange;稀有资源。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#008aff;tidewater^reset; planet covered in sharp reefs, spike-like stone formations and ^orange;rare resources^reset;. ^cyan;Recommend: Poison protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#414556;有毒月亮。^reset;整个星球覆盖着腐烂的土壤。
Texts.Eng: A ^#414556;toxic^reset; moon covered in deposits of long-rotted soil.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#505f50;影子星球。^reset;这个资源丰富的地方看起来像是鬼域，当心脚下。
Texts.Eng: A ^#505f50;complete lack of light^reset; makes this resource-rich moon a rather spooky, dangerous place. Watch your step.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#505f50;气体星球。^reset;表面有很多气体。地下蕴含丰富^orange;矿物资源。^reset;^cyan;提示：压力极高，注意带上相应保护科技！^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#505f50;gas ball^reset; with enough atmosphere to provide access to ^orange;valuable resources^reset;. ^cyan;Recommend: Extreme Pressure Protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#505f50;气体星球^reset;。地下蕴含丰富的矿物资源。^red;警告^reset;这里的环境很危险！^cyan;提示：压力极高，注意带上相应保护科技！^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#505f50;gas ball^reset; with enough mass to allow exploration. Take ^red;extreme caution^reset; wandering here. ^cyan;Recommend: Extreme Pressure Protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#505f50;影子星球。^reset;黑暗的如同沥青一样，藏着各种各样的^orange;稀有资源^reset;。
Texts.Eng: A ^#505f50;shadow moon^reset; is dark as pitch, and hides various ^orange;valuable resources^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#517f51;胶体星球。^reset;看起来非常泥泞，表面弹性很高。奇怪的^red;生物特征^reset;已发现。
Texts.Eng: A ^#517f51;gelatinous^reset;, slimy world. High elasticity. Strange, ^red;massive lifeforms^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#517f51;原体星球。^reset;星球上有着突变的菌群和不寻常的生命体征，扫描还显示表面有着动植物活动的迹象。地下还探测到了^#e2ef55;原体矿石。^reset;^cyan;提示：原毒素传播，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#517f51;proto world^reset;. Mutated flora and unusual life-signs detected. Scanners have also located caches of ^#e2ef55;Protocite Ore^reset;. ^cyan;Recommend: Proto-Poison protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#61ffe3;冷冻星球。^white;冻土一直蔓延至地表深处，这里的温度也是^red;极其危险的低。 ^white;
Texts.Eng: A ^#61ffe3;frozen^white; place, formed of ice - the permafrost runs deep here. Snow storms are common, and ^red;temperatures are dangerously low^white;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#64616f;无光星球。^reset;表面没有任何光芒。大量的^#d16fff;稀土矿石^reset;已探测到，带好你的手电筒。
Texts.Eng: A ^#64616f;lightless sphere^reset; with no light but plenty of ^#d16fff;Effigium ore^reset; detected. Bring ample light.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#663322;火山月亮。^reset;表面火山活动频繁，有着大量的^red;岩浆和高温。^reset;探索时注意安全。
Texts.Eng: A ^#663322;volcanic^reset; moon flowing with ^red;lava and heat^reset;. Take care when exploring.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#666666;金属月亮^reset;。表面含有丰富的^#90ac7c;稀有金属。^reset;上面似乎居住着危险的种族和动物。^#d16fff;重金属矿石^reset;和^#ffda44;月长石矿^reset;已探测到。
Texts.Eng: A ^#666666;metallic world^reset; built by an ancient race. ^#90ac7c;Abundant rare metals^reset; detected. Scans also show mechanical beings.

Texts.Chs: 奇怪的^#7fe96e;真菌^reset;以巨大的规模覆盖了整个星球。^#green;有机资源^reset;被大量探测到。
Texts.Eng: A ^#7fe96e;fungal^reset; colony of unsurpassed size engulfs almost this entire world. ^#green;Organic resources^reset; detected in plentiful amounts.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#8349cc;焦油星球。^reset;该星球有着^#555555;丰富的石油^reset;资源蕴含在地面和地下。^orange;焦油保护^reset;在这里应该会很有用。
Texts.Eng: A ^#8349cc;tar ball^reset; with ^#555555;abundant oil sources^reset; detected on and below the surface. Some sort of ^orange;tar protection^reset; could prove useful.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#8349cc;焦油星球^reset;。有着半宜居地表，其表面塞满了液体。^#555555;丰富的石油^reset;和垃圾到处都是。
Texts.Eng: A ^#8349cc;tar ball^reset; with a semi-livable surface. Encumbering bodies of liquid with ^#555555;abundant oil^reset; litter the surface.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#8349cc;焦油星球。^reset;似乎让你感觉呼吸困难。有害的^orange;焦油和沥青^reset;将减慢你的速度。
Texts.Eng: A ^#8349cc;tar-covered world^reset; with breathable atmosphere. ^orange;Hazardous sticky pools of tar^reset; will make for slow travel.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#848484;荒芜星球。^reset;一些古文明建筑依然矗立于此，很久以前这里发生了一次可怕的灾难。扫描发现了一些^#43a43a;古遗址。^reset;我觉得里面应该存有许多失落的宝藏。
Texts.Eng: A ^#848484;wasteland^reset; housing the remains of a once great civilization. Something awful happened here, long ago. ^#43a43a;Ancient ruins^reset; hold many lost treasures.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#848484;荒芜星球。^reset;星球表面有着大量的废墟和^#43a43a;已毁灭的文明^reset;。如果你想去探险的话，只要去海岸线附近就可以找到这些废墟。
Texts.Eng: A ^#848484;wasteland^reset;. Abundant ruins of ^#43a43a;a dead civilization^reset; located primarily near coastlines.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#86a8c5;冰封月亮。^reset;注意你的落脚点。上面似乎还有着^red;危险的动物^reset;。表面含有丰富的^#e43558;月长石矿^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#86a8c5;frozen moon^reset;. Watch your footing, and beware ^red;dangerous wildlife^reset;. Abundant ^#e43558;Moonstone ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#8cf387;热带雨林^reset;星球。大量有机生命，丰富的^#green;有机物质^reset;已被探测到。
Texts.Eng: A ^#8cf387;rainforest^reset; planet absolutely ripe with organic life. Abundant ^#green;organic resources^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#914560;超高密度^reset;的星球。相比其他相同大小的行星有着更高的引力。^red;非常危险，小心行事！
Texts.Eng: A ^#914560;Super-dense^reset; world with a much higher gravitational force than other planets of the same size. ^red;Very dangerous. Tread carefully.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#999999;多岩星球。^reset;到处充斥着锯齿状的危险石头。
Texts.Eng: A ^#999999;rocky moon^reset; with jagged and dangerous stone formations.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#a56caf;水晶之月。^reset;水晶之月是获取^#e6c011;月形晶体矿石^reset;唯一的来源。硅酸盐^e43774;晶体形态^reset;已探测。
Texts.Eng: A ^#a56caf;crystalline^reset; planet. These worlds are the sole source of ^#e6c011;lunari crystals^reset;. Silicate ^e43774;crystal formations^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#aa6b48;痛苦之源^reset;星球。这个不寻常的行星似乎发生了^#cc8d5a;生物突变。^reset;我想一定是一位疯狂的上帝创造了它。^red;警告:这是个很疯狂的星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#aa6b48;dark atropus^reset; world. This unusual planet appears to be ^#cc8d5a;biologically mutated^reset; as if created by an insane God. ^red;Warning: Causes Madness^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#b398ba;山地星球^reset;的星球。其地形复杂，表面是难以行进的，但是它含有丰富的^#e47998;金属资源^reset;，它应该是有价值的。
Texts.Eng: A ^#b398ba;mountainous^reset; surface makes for slow travel, but it has ^#e47998;abundant sources of metals^reset; that should prove useful.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#b86c00;冰封火山^reset;星球？看似平静的表面暗藏杀机。小心^red;熔岩，低温，液氮^reset;的威胁！^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#b86c00;frozen volcanic^reset; surface ripe with hazards awaits below. ^red;Beware of lava, cold and liquid nitrogen dangers.^reset; ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#c80000;红色沙漠^reset;星球。整个星球基本都是高温状态。^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#c80000;red desert^reset; stretches across almost the entire circumference of this exceptionally hot world. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#505f50;影子星球。^reset;这个资源丰富的地方看起来像是鬼域，当心脚下。
Texts.Eng: A ^#ccfa33;shadow world^reset; that seems to block our scanners. Whatever is down there, it's likely rather dark. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗表面有着^#da67b8;奇异海洋^reset;的星球。海洋几乎覆盖了整颗星球。除了大量的液体，扫描仪没显示出什么其他有用的信息。
Texts.Eng: A ^#da67b8;strange sea^reset; covers this planet. Scanners reveal little useful info apart from large quantities of liquid. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#ffea00;硫酸星球。^reset;星球表面覆盖了满满的硫酸。这里含有丰富的^#772211;朱砂矿石^reset;资源。^cyan;提示：硫酸横流，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#ffea00;sulphuric ocean^reset; covers almost the entire surface. Abundant ^#772211;cinnabar^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Sulphuric Acid protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#ffea00;硫酸星球。^reset;我想你不应该下去^red;如果你坚持要下去，请务必带好装备^reset;！^cyan;提示：硫酸横流，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#ffea00;sulphuric ocean^reset; should not be traversed without ^red;acid protection and an air source^reset;. ^cyan;Recommend: Sulphuric Acid protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#ffea00;硫酸星球。^reset;这颗星球非常危险^red;请保持谨慎。^reset;我想，这真是一个可怕的度假地点。^cyan;提示：硫酸横流，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^#ffea00;sulphuric ocean^reset;. This planet is ^red;extremely dangerous. Use caution^reset;. Likely a terrible vacation spot. ^cyan;Recommend: Sulphuric Acid protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^red;致命的^reset;^#ffea00;硫酸星球。^reset;如果没有足够的保护，别去作死！^cyan;提示：硫酸横流，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A ^red;deadly^reset; ^#ffea00;sulphuric^reset; world. Do not attempt travel without sufficient protection. ^cyan;Recommend: Sulphuric Acid protection^reset;
A bizarre world that seems to straddle dimensions, this ^#e78442;aether sea^reset; calls to you with its dark, acid-laced serenity. ^cyan;Recommend: Acid Protection^reset;
Texts.Chs: 一颗奇怪的星球，似乎跨越了维度。星球表面覆盖着^#e78442;以太海^reset;表面的酸液似乎在呼唤你。^cyan;提示：硫酸横流，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
一颗^#517f51;胶体星球。^reset;表面高弹性。探测到奇异的生物。
Texts.Eng: A bouncy, sticky ^#517f51;gelatinous^reset;, world. It is evident that this will make for some rather gross exploration.

Texts.Chs: 一颗寒冷，多沙的^#b3947c;沙漠之月。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A cold, sandy ^#b3947c;desert moon^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗致命的^#69f1fd;液氮星球^reset;。大部分液氮都在冰层下方。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A deadly ^#69f1fd;liquid nitrogen sea^reset; awaits beneath a dense layer of ice. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 又深又泥泞的^#97be6a;沼泽^reset;几乎覆盖了整个星球表面。丰富的^green;藻类^reset;和其他有机资源已探测。
Texts.Eng: A deep, thick ^#97be6a;bog^reset; covers nearly all of this world. Rich in ^green;Algae^reset; and other organic resources.

Texts.Chs: 一颗寒冷的,^#86a8c5;冰封月亮^reset;。光滑的表面很危险！^#e43558;月长石矿^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A frigid, ^#86a8c5;frozen moon^reset;. Slippery surfaces could prove hazardous. Abundant ^#e43558;Moonstone ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#cd5d02;炼狱星球。^reset;表面都是满满的^red;熔岩。^reset;致命的^red;高温^reset;将会烤熟你，装备好你的高温防护装备。^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A hellish ^#cd5d02;infernus^reset; planet covered in ^red;lava^reset; and ^red;lethal temperatures^reset;. Bring extreme heat protection. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗毫无生气的^#b3947c;沙漠之月。^reset;
Texts.Eng: A lifeless ^#b3947c;desert moon^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 奇怪的^#7fe96e;真菌^reset;在这颗星球上失去了控制。真菌几乎覆盖了整个星球，表面孢子非常丰富！^#green;有机资源^reset;已探测。
Texts.Eng: A mutant ^#7fe96e;fungus^reset; has grown out of control, covering this world. Spores Galore! Abundant ^#green;organic resources^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#414556;有毒月亮。^reset;虽然没什么危险，但我不建议你用鼻子去呼吸这里的空气。
Texts.Eng: A putrid and ^#414556;toxic^reset; moon. While not inherently dangerous, I recommend not breathing through your nose.

Texts.Chs: 一颗寒冷的星球，表面有着^red;危险的低温。^white;这里几乎没有动物，也没有植物，这只是一个被废弃的^#00ffe4;寒冷小岛。^white;
Texts.Eng: A site of ^red;dangerously low temperatures^white;. There are few animals here, and no plant-life at all - just forsaken islands in a ^#00ffe4;frigid ocean^white;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗表面有着^#da67b8;奇异海洋^reset;的星球。扫描仪无法扫描这颗星球，很难检测这颗星球的液体结构。
Texts.Eng: Blocked by our scanners, I am finding it hard to detect the liquid composing this ^#da67b8;strange sea^reset;. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#00f0ff;伊甸星球。^reset;其天气基本都是阳光明媚的。这颗星球似乎正在等待着探险家沿着这条路继续探索下去。
Texts.Eng: Bright and sunny most of the time, this ^#00f0ff;eden^reset; awaits an intrepid explorer to make it a civilized stop along this star route.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#c80000;红色沙漠^reset;星球。炎热几乎横跨整个星球表面^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Bring extreme heat protection when exploring this ^#c80000;red desert^reset; as exposure for prolonged periods will prove 100% fatal. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#78657f;半影星球。^reset;表面非常黑暗，但有着许多发光的动物。它是^#9d5bd0;半影矿石^reset;唯一的来源。
Texts.Eng: Dark, but with plenty of bioluminescent fauna, ^#78657f;penumbra^reset; worlds are the only known viable source of ^#9d5bd0;penumbrite^reset;.

Dark, strange and quiet, this ^#e78442;aether sea^reset; is awaiting exploration. Tread carefully, for the atmosphere is acidic. ^orange;Xithricite Ore detected^reset;.^cyan;Recommend: Acid Protection^reset;.
Texts.Chs: 这里显的黑暗，陌生，安静，这是一颗表面覆盖着^#e78442以太海^reset;的星球，它正等待着探索。不过空气中的酸液异常致命，你需要保持小心。 ^orange;X晶体矿石已探测^reset;。^cyan;提示：酸液活动频繁，注意带上相应保护科技^reset;。
黑暗笼罩了这颗枝繁茂密的^#59a849;黑暗星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Darkness covers the dense woodlands of this ^#59a849;dark primeval^reset; planet.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#517f51;原始星球。^reset;我在这里发现了不寻常的生命迹象，看来这里的生物已经发生了某种突变！^#e2ef55;不寻常的矿石^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：病毒肆虐，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: I am detecting unusual life signs on this ^#517f51;proto world^reset;. It appears this life has been purposefully mutated. ^#e2ef55;Unusual ores^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Proto-Poison protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#505f50;影子星球。^reset;很少能有比这里更黑暗的地方。像是在阻碍我们的扫描，下面的一切都有可能是黑暗的。
Texts.Eng: I get no readings whatsoever off of this ^#ccfa33;shadow world^reset;, but it appears there will be little light on the surface to speak of. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#69f1fd;液氮星球。^reset;表面都是^red;危险的严寒^reset;和滑溜溜的冰面。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: It should be assumed that this ^#69f1fd;liquid nitrogen sea^reset; is both ^red;dangerously cold^reset; and slippery. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 潮湿肮脏的地面和密集的^#97be6a;沼泽^reset;覆盖这颗星球大部分的表面。表面^green;藻类^reset;资源丰富。
Texts.Eng: Wet, mucky ground and dense ^#97be6a;bog^reset; extends across most of the surface. Harvesting ^green;algae^reset; should prove simple.

Texts.Chs: 看起来没什么好介绍的，它是一颗^#505f50;气体星球^reset;。地下蕴含丰富的矿物资源。^cyan;提示：压力极高，注意带上相应保护科技！^reset;
Texts.Eng: While it has almost no ground to speak of, ^#505f50;a gas ball^reset; can yield useful resources. ^cyan;Recommend: Extreme Pressure Protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 显示虽然很诱人，但还是要保持冷静，该星球显示着未知的信号！它像是个^#ba3b04;海洋？^reset;星球。^red;警告：这是个很疯狂的星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: While tempting, avoid the urge to swim in the gore and guts on this ^#ba3b04;atropus sea^reset; planet. ^red;Warning: Causes Madness^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#008aff;潮汐星球。^reset;潮汐在这个星球活动频繁。^orange;稀有资源^reset;在地表和海面被探测到。
Texts.Eng: ^#008aff;Tidal^reset; forces are extra strong on this ocean world. Unusual ^orange;rare resources^reset; detected on the ocean floor. ^cyan;Recommend: Poison protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#414556;有毒月亮。^reset;腐烂的物质构成了它质量的很大一部分。
Texts.Eng: ^#414556;Toxic^reset; materials compose the majority of this moon.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#517f51;胶体星球。^reset;粘液几乎组成了整个星球。^red;巨型夜行动物^reset;已发现。
Texts.Eng: ^#517f51;Slime^reset; forms almost this entire planet. ^red;Huge nocturnal creatures^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: ^#59a849;巨大的树^reset;大量的生长在这古老的^#cd5d02;上古森林^reset;星球。丰富的^orange;有机资源^reset;被发现。
Texts.Eng: ^#59a849;Giant trees^reset; are abundant on this ^#cd5d02;primeval forest^reset; world. Abundant ^orange;organic resources^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#59a849;巨树林立^reset;的星球。拥有大量的^#cd5d02;火山原始森林。^reset;还有丰富的^orange;有机资源。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#59a849;Giant trees^reset; are abundant on this ^#cd5d02;volcanic primeval forest^reset; world. Abundant ^orange;organic resources^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#59a849;原始森林^reset;星球。拥有丰富的^orange;有机资源。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#59a849;Primeval forest^reset; planets are early in their life-cycles and rich in ^orange;organic resources^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#663322;火山月亮。^reset;火山活动在这颗月亮上到处横行。
Texts.Eng: ^#663322;Volcanic activity^reset; runs rampant on this moon.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#666666;金属月亮^reset;。表面含有丰富的^#90ac7c;稀有金属。^reset;上面似乎居住着危险的种族和动物。^#d16fff;重金属矿石^reset;和^#ffda44;月长石矿^reset;已探测到。
Texts.Eng: ^#666666;Cyber-Sphere^reset; worlds hold ^#90ac7c;abundant rare metals^reset; guarded by dangerous servitors. ^#d16fff;Densinium ore^reset; and ^#ffda44;high metallic content^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#69f1fd;液氮星球。^reset;液氮是这颗卫星的全部液体，这表面如果你没有任何防护并尝试登录这颗星球将是^red;自杀行为。^reset;^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#69f1fd;Liquid nitrogen^reset; forms the entirety of this moon's liquid. This will prove ^red;dangerous without protection^reset;. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#78657f;半影星球。^reset;该行星由独特的材料组成，它反射一切光线，但却不阻挡紫外线，这是唯一存在的射线。^#9d5bd0;半影矿石^reset;已探测。
Texts.Eng: ^#78657f;Penumbra^reset; planets have a unique makeup that blocks light but not UV. They are the sole source of ^#9d5bd0;penumbrite ore^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#83b369;辐射星球。^reset;表面有着密集且致命的辐射，还有大量的^#4444ff;铱矿石^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：辐射过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#83b369;Irradiated^reset; world. Dense pockets of lethal radiation, and large quantities of ^#4444ff;Irradium ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Radiation protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#86a8c5;冰封月亮。^reset;气温非常寒冷，小心点！看起来很危险！已探测到^#e43558;月长石矿^reset;位于地下。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#86a8c5;Frozen moons^reset; are cold and dangerous to the unwary. I am detecting valuable ^#e43558;moonstone ore^reset; underground. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#8cf387;热带雨林^reset;星球。雨林几乎覆盖了整个星球表面。探测到大量的竹子和^green;有机资源。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#8cf387;Rainforest^reset; covers nearly the entire surface of this warm and inviting planet. ^green;Bamboo and other organic resources detected in large quantities.^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#8cf387;热带雨林^reset;星球。在这里可以找到很多的^#green;有机物质。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#8cf387;Rainforest^reset; has claimed the majority of this organic-rich world. Abundant ^#green;organic resources^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#914560;超高密度^reset;的星球。表面有着巨大的重力。小心行事，^red;坠落意味着死亡！^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#914560;Super-dense^reset; worlds have enormous gravitational force. ^red;Extreme danger from falling^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#999999;多岩星球。^reset;表面有着崎岖的地形，但没什么危险。
Texts.Eng: ^#999999;Rocky moons^reset; are tough terrain, but otherwise harmless.

Texts.Chs: ^#b86c00;冰封火山^reset;。这种星球是比较罕见的，拥有危险的冰面，两极分化严重的岩石和熔岩。许多有用的^green;资源^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#b86c00;Frozen Volcanic^reset; worlds are relatively rare, and possess a dangerous mix of ice, burning rock and lava. ^green;Many useful resources^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#b86c00;冰封火山^reset;星球，这怎么可能呢？科学难以解释这个现象。表面许多有用的^green;资源^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#b86c00;Frozen Volcanic^reset;? How is this even possible? Science is at a loss to provide an explanation. ^green;Many useful resources^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Heating EPP^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#ba3b04;海洋星球？^reset;星球表面堆满了腐败和丑恶，还有满满的^#8e5ca6;未知有机物^reset;元素。^red;警告：这是个很疯狂的星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#ba3b04;Atropus Seas^reset; are putrid and repulsive, loaded with ^#8e5ca6;unknown organic^reset; elements. ^red;Warning: Causes Madness^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#cc8d5a;痛苦之源^reset;星球。真是个让人恶心的星球，地狱般的表面是由各种组织组成！^#b41c1c;血钻^reset;已探测。^red;警告：这是个很疯狂的星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#cc8d5a;Atropus^reset; worlds are abhorrent, hellish spheres composed of matter both living and dead. ^#b41c1c;Blood diamond^reset; detected. ^red;Warning: Causes Madness^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#cd5d02;地狱般^reset;的星球。整个星球都是^red;非常致命的^reset;。千万不要在没有任何保护的情况下登录这颗星球。地下已探测到^#d16fff;重金属矿石。^reset;^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#cd5d02;Infernus^reset; worlds are ^red;exceptionally deadly^reset; and not to be undertaken without protection. ^#d16fff;Densinium ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#cd5d02;炼狱星球。^reset;表面的温度^red;非常致命。^reset;没有保护你将无法生存。^#d16fff;重金属矿石^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#cd5d02;Infernus^reset; worlds are ^red;exceptionally deadly^reset; and not to be undertaken without protection. ^orange;Pyreite Ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一些^#e43774;未知^reset;的东西干扰了星球扫描，小心行事！
Texts.Eng: ^#e43774;Unknown^reset; interference prevents scanning of the planet surface. Proceed carefully. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一些^#e43774;未知^reset;的东西扰乱了扫描仪，我得不到什么有用的消息，建议保持谨慎。
Texts.Eng: ^#e43774;Unknown^reset; readings are confusing our scanners. I can glean nothing useful from them. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这是颗^#ffc2f9;颜色鲜艳^reset;的星球。而且^orange;辐射很高^reset;。但是它含有丰富的^green;彩虹石矿。^reset;^cyan;提示：辐射过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#ffc2f9;Chromatic^reset; worlds are strange and ^orange;radioactive^reset; but rich in valuable ^green;prism shards^reset;. ^cyan;Recommended: Deadly Radiation protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这是颗^#ffc2f9;颜色鲜艳^reset;的星球。似乎有着严重的^orange;放射性环境^reset;。扫描仪已经探测到稀有矿产。^cyan;提示：辐射过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#ffc2f9;Chromatic^reset; worlds sparkle like a ^orange;radioactive rainbow^reset; with glistening ^green;prism shards^reset;. ^cyan;Recommended: Deadly Radiation protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#ffea00;硫酸星球。^reset;硫酸气体在空气中被检测到。星球表面^red;致命的硫酸^reset;到处都是。地下有着丰富的^#772211;富碘矿石^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：硫酸横流，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#ffea00;Sulphuric^reset; atmosphere detected. ^red;Deadly pools of acid^reset; lie below in abundance. ^#772211;Iodine-rich ores^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Sulphuric Acid protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#ffea00;硫酸星球。^reset;这颗星球是极其危险的，它们没有任何光线来源，所以显得情况更糟糕。丰富的^#772211;朱砂矿石^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：硫酸横流，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^#ffea00;Sulphuric^reset; worlds are extremely dangerous. Airless, acidic and toxic atmosphere. Abundant ^#772211;cinnabar^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Sulphuric Acid protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这颗星球温度^red;出奇的低。^white;整个星球基本都是^#61ffe3;冰冻的。^white;而且这里的环境只适宜能够抵抗低温的植物和动物生存。
Texts.Eng: ^red;Temperatures at the beam site are dangerously low^white;. The area is ^#61ffe3;frozen^white;, and inhabited only by flora and fauna that are extremely resistant to the cold.

Texts.Chs: 扫描显示^red;登录点温度极低。^white;你将会被致命的寒冷困在一个^#00ffe4;小岛^white;上。我强烈建议你戴一条围巾。
Texts.Eng: ^red;Temperatures at the landing site are dangerously low.^white; You will be beaming onto a small island surrounded by ^#00ffe4;frigid ocean^white;. I strongly advise you to wear a scarf.

Texts.Chs: 扫描仪显示这颗^#666666;金属月亮^reset;已经完蛋了。它的年龄有^#90ac7c;12000000^reset;年。是谁创造了这个奇迹，又是为什么？
Texts.Eng: Scanners detect that this ^#666666;cybernetic world^reset; is over ^#90ac7c;12 million^reset; years old. Who built this marvel, and why?

Texts.Chs: 扫描仪检测到非常密集的^#cd5d02;原始森林。^reset;在这个星球上有着各种各样的^orange;爬虫^reset;探测到生命迹象。
Texts.Eng: Scanners have detected extremely dense ^#cd5d02;primeval forests^reset; on this planet. ^orange;Reptilian^reset; life-signs detected.

Texts.Chs: 扫描显示这颗冰球有着^red;足以致命的温度^reset;！在这^#69f1fd;冰川上^reset;请谨慎行事！^orange;原力矿^reset;已探测.^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Scanners show ^red;deadly ice and abolute zero temperatures^reset; on this ^#69f1fd;ice waste^reset;. Proceed with caution. ^orange;Isogen Ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Cold protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 扫描显示该星球表面有^red;足以致命的温度。^reset;在这颗^#69f1fd;冰球上，^reset;光照量极少。^red;在黑暗中探索请小心！^reset;^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Scanners show ^red;deadly ice and abolute zero temperatures^reset; on this ^#69f1fd;ice waste^reset;. Sunlight is minimal. ^red;Tread carefully in the dark^reset;. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Cold protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 扫描仪显示，该星球有着令人恶心的^#ba3b04;海洋？似乎有着^reset;各种未知的^#8e5ca6;有机物混合。^reset;已探测到^red;血钻，寂灭矿石^reset;资源。^red;警告:这是个很疯狂的星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Scanners show disgusting ^#ba3b04;atropal seas^reset; ripe with ^#8e5ca6;unknown organic^reset; elements. A source of ^red;blood diamonds and quietus ore^reset;. ^red;Warning: Causes Madness^reset;

Texts.Chs: 扫描仪显示奇怪的该星球拥有奇怪的^#ba3b04;血石^reset;矿层，还有着^#8e5ca6;未知有机物质。^reset;已探测到^red;血钻和寂灭矿石^reset;资源。
Texts.Eng: Scanners show strange ^#ba3b04;bloodstone^reset; formations and ^#8e5ca6;unknown organic^reset; elements. A source of ^red;blood diamonds and quietus ore^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 扫描显示这颗^#69f1fd;冰球^reset;是^red;极其危险^reset;的！表面有着不寻常的地形。^orange;原力矿^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Scanners show this ^#69f1fd;ice waste^reset; is ^red;extremely dangerous^reset; and has unusual terrain. ^orange;Isogen Ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Cold protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 扫描显示这颗^#69f1fd;冰球^reset;是^red;极其危险的^reset;表面几乎没有光。^orange;原力矿^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Scanners show this ^#69f1fd;ice waste^reset; is ^red;extremely dangerous^reset; and nearly no light. ^orange;Trianglium ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Cold protection^reset;
Serious weather, high-tides and strangeness abound on this acidic ^#e78442;aether sea^reset;. ^cyan;Recommend: Acid Protection^reset;
Texts.Chs: 恶劣的天气，频繁的潮汐活动，还有到处都是的硫酸。星球表面基本都是被^#e78442;以太海^reset;覆盖。^cyan;提示：酸液活动频繁，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
一些可怕的灾难导致这个星球成为了一个^#59a849;无人区。^reset;是因为外星人入侵吗？谁又能告诉我呢？
Texts.Eng: Some hideous catastrophe has resulted in this planet becoming a ^#59a849;Tabula Rasa^reset;. A Floran invasion? Who can tell?

Texts.Chs: 一些可怕的灾难导致这个星球成为了一个^#59a849;无人区。^reset;是因为某种末日病毒吗？也许你可以找到它。
Texts.Eng: Some hideous catastrophe has resulted in this planet becoming a ^#59a849;Tabula Rasa^reset;. A doomsday virus? Maybe you can find out.

Texts.Chs: 一些可怕的灾难导致这个星球成为了一个^#59a849;无人区。^reset;是因为很久以前的核战争吗？谁知道呢？
Texts.Eng: Some hideous catastrophe has resulted in this planet becoming a ^#59a849;Tabula Rasa^reset;. A long-ago nuclear armageddon? Who knows?

Texts.Chs: 这里有点^red;不太对劲。^reset;该星球是由^#e43774;未知的材料^reset;组成，建议保持谨慎。
Texts.Eng: Something here is ^red;blocking our scanners^reset;, leaving this planet's composition essentially ^#e43774;unknown^reset;. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#517f51;原始星球。^reset;突变的生物在这个星球横行肆虐。有价值的^#e2ef55;原体矿石^reset;在这分布非常丰富。^cyan;提示：病毒肆虐，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Mutated life runs rampant here on this ^#517f51;proto world^reset;. Valuable ^#e2ef55;protocite^reset; is found in abundance. ^cyan;Recommend: Proto-Poison protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这颗行星有着丰富的奇异树木和奇怪的突变动物群。星球上^#83b369;辐射^reset;量似乎很高。^cyan;提示：辐射过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Mutated trees and bizarre fauna are abundant on this ^#83b369;irradiated^reset; planet. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Radiation protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 令人难以理解的^#97be6a;沼泽^reset;这个潮湿多雨的世界像是毯子一样。表面^green;藻类^reset;和生物燃料丰富。
Texts.Eng: Nearly impenetrable ^#97be6a;bog^reset; blankets this moist and rainy world. ^green;Algae^reset; for bio-fuel is abundant.

Texts.Chs: 这里曾经是一个繁荣的星球，不知道什么原因这里原本存在的生命都消失了，所有的建筑都变成了^#848484;一片废墟。^reset;现在只能见到一些^red;强盗和土匪^reset;在这颗星球上四处掠夺。
Texts.Eng: Once a thriving world, something eradicated most life on this ^#848484;wasteland^reset;. ^red;Bandits and raiders^reset; are commonly found scavenging for resources.

Texts.Chs: 这颗奇怪的^#64616f;无光星球^reset;反射任何光源，无扫描结果。
Texts.Eng: The atmosphere of this ^#64616f;lightless sphere^reset; blocks any source of light from penetrating. Scans inconclusive.

Texts.Chs: 扫描显示，你将会有很高的几率会降落在一个^red;寒冷^white;的小岛上，而且周围都是^#00ffe4;冰冷的海水。^white;而且我要提醒你，你将会有0.0025%的几率将被直接传送进大海里，你将会很快屈服于致命的寒冷。
Texts.Eng: The beam site is ^red;intensely cold^white;: a tiny island in a ^#00ffe4;frigid ocean^white;. There is a 0.025% chance you will mis-beam into the water, quickly succumbing to the awful chill.

Texts.Chs: 这颗星球有很多孤立的小岛。^#ff1818;岩浆^white;活动很频繁。你会考虑登录这颗^red;灸热^white;星球来证明你的毅力吗？
Texts.Eng: The beam site is a tiny island isolated in a sea of ^#ff1818;magma^white;. That you would consider visiting this ^red;searingly hot^white; planet speaks volumes of your fortitude.

Texts.Chs: 登陆点有点冷，但没什么危险。到处都是^#69f1fd;雪。^white;暴风雪也经常在这颗星球肆虐，帽子和手套在这里可是必需品。
Texts.Eng: The landing location is cold, but not perilously so. ^#69f1fd;Snow^white; covers the area and blizzards are a possibility. A hat and gloves may be advisable.

Texts.Chs: 这颗星球表面大部分都是炎热的^#c80000;红色沙漠。^reset;生物扫描显示该区域似乎有着有趣的动植物。^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: The majority of the planet's surface is a scorching ^#c80000;red desert^reset;. Bio-scans reveal interesting flora and fauna. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这颗行星表面是^red;非常热^white;的。很少有生物能在这颗^#ff1818;岩浆^white;横行的星球生存。
Texts.Eng: The planet surface is ^red;dangerously hot^white;. Few creatures eke out an existence amongst the planet's vast oceans of ^#ff1818;magma^white;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#505f50;影子星球。^reset;很少能有比这里更黑暗的地方。像是在阻碍我们的扫描，下面的一切都有可能是黑暗的。
Texts.Eng: There are few places darker than a ^#505f50;shadow moon^reset;. Scanners detect unknown material signatures.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#59a849;黑暗星球。^reset;阳光很少能够穿透树冠照射在星球表面，带好你的手电筒。
Texts.Eng: There is little light penetrating the tree canopies here on this ^#59a849;dark primeval^reset; forest planet. Bring a light-source.

Texts.Chs: 这颗^#008aff;潮汐星球。^reset;的形成，是由于卫星的强大引力造成的，其表面经常肆虐着狂风骇浪，海洋中显示有很多的动物群。^orange;突变结节^reset;已探测。
Texts.Eng: This ^#008aff;tidewater^reset; world is subject to massive tidal forces. Ocean currents show fauna rich in ^orange;mutated nodules^reset; with interesting applications. ^cyan;Recommend: Poison protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#00f0ff;伊甸星球。^reset;几乎什么什么威胁，充足的阳光，非常适合用来建立家园。^#9dbeef;治疗之水^reset;已探测。
Texts.Eng: This ^#00f0ff;eden ^reset;has very little in the way of hostile life and very little darkness. A lovely place to build a home. ^#9dbeef;Healing waters^reset; dot the surface.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#00f0ff;伊甸星球。^reset;看起来非常好客。似乎没有什么危险，表面分布着丰富的^#9dbeef;治疗之水^reset;。非常适合用来建立家园。
Texts.Eng: This ^#00f0ff;eden^reset; looks incredibly hospitable. I detect few life signs and ample ^#9dbeef;Healing waters^reset;. An ideal place to make a home.

Texts.Chs: 这是颗^#59a849;原始森林^reset;星球。星球表面^#cd5d02;火山活动频繁。^reset;丰富的^orange;有机资源^reset;被发现。
Texts.Eng: This ^#59a849;primeval forest^reset; is ripe with ^#cd5d02;volcanic activity^reset;. Abundant ^orange;organic resources^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#663322;火山月亮。^reset;地下蕴含丰富的飞船燃料，但是要小心某种奇怪的生物。
Texts.Eng: This ^#663322;volcanic moon^reset; should contain abundant erchius fuel, but use caution when travelling.

Texts.Chs: 这颗^#69f1fd;冰球^reset;有着足以致命的低温，所以要确定你有^red;极端寒冷保护^reset;。探测到有价值的资源。^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: This ^#69f1fd;ice waste^reset; appears to have fatal temperatures, so be sure you have ^red;extreme cold protection^reset;. I am detecting valuable resources underground. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Cold protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这颗^#69f1fd;冰球^reset;有着足以致命的低温，所以要确定你有^red;极端寒冷保护^reset;.所有的光几乎都被大气层阻挡了.^cyan;提示：温度过低，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: This ^#69f1fd;ice waste^reset; appears to have fatal temperatures, so be sure you have ^red;extreme cold protection^reset;. Nearly all light is blocked by the atmosphere. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Cold protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这颗^#a56caf;水晶之月^reset;含有有丰富的^#e6c011;月形晶体矿石。^reset;因为太阳的照射反光，这颗卫星会变的很漂亮。
Texts.Eng: This ^#a56caf;crystalline world^reset; is rich in ^#e6c011;lunari crystals^reset; and shines beautifully from the light of the nearby sun.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#b3947c;沙漠之月。^reset;表面干燥，尘土飞扬，毫无生气。
Texts.Eng: This ^#b3947c;desert moon^reset; is dry, dusty and unpopulated.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#b398ba;山地星球。^reset;其表面千疮百孔，地下有着各种^#e47998;矿石资源。^reset;
Texts.Eng: This ^#b398ba;mountainous^reset; world is absolutely riddled with ^#e47998;ores of all sorts^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#b398ba;山地星球。^reset;表面有着巨大的山脉，扫描显示的该星球有着大型两足动物的活动。^#e47998;高熔点矿石^reset;已探测到。
Texts.Eng: This ^#b398ba;mountainous^reset; world is studded with immensely tall rocky mountains. Scans show large bipedal primitives. ^#e47998;Zerchesium ore^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#ccfa33;影子星球。^reset;其表面阻止所有扫描信号。建议你^red;保持谨慎！^reset;
Texts.Eng: This ^#ccfa33;shadow world^reset; prevents any and all scans. ^red;Use extreme caution when travelling^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^red;严寒星球。^white;着陆点都是^#61ffe3;冻结的固体。 ^white;这里似乎很适宜低温冷藏，但还是要保护自己远离寒冷。
Texts.Eng: This ^red;dangerously cold.^white; landing site is ^#61ffe3;frozen^white; solid. High likelihood of accidental self-cryopreservation. Protect yourself from the cold.

Texts.Chs: 这是颗^red;非常热^white;的星球。星球表面都是^#ff1818;岩浆^white;构成。记住：你不屈的精神真是令人钦佩，但你不屈的精神可不能帮你降温。
Texts.Eng: This ^red;dangerously hot^white; planet is chiefly composed of ^#ff1818;magma^white;. Remember, your resilient spirit is admirable, but it is not flame retardant.

Texts.Chs: 这个寒冷的登陆点到处都是^#69f1fd;雪。^white;各式各样的动物和植物也都生存在这寒冷的环境下。嗯，是一个打雪仗的好地方。
Texts.Eng: This chilly landing site is laden with ^#69f1fd;snow^white;. Sundry trees grow here and various animals also thrive in the cold conditions. An excellent place to make snowballs.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#cc8d5a;痛苦之源^reset;星球。整个星球似乎是由肉，筋，骨头组成。^#b41c1c;寂灭矿石^reset;已探测。^red;警告:这是个很疯狂的星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: This horrific ^#cc8d5a;atropus^reset; world appears to be composed of flesh, sinew, and gore. ^#b41c1c;Quietus ore^reset; detected. ^red;Warning: Causes Madness^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这颗星球是比较寒冷的，地面覆盖着^#69f1fd;厚厚的雪。^white;我的扫描仪还发现这里有着蹦蹦跳跳的动物在活动。
Texts.Eng: This location is relatively chill, and ^#69f1fd;snow^white; lies thickly on the ground. My sensors indicate that there are critters scampering through the soft blanket of white.

Texts.Chs: 这颗星球似乎被数量巨大的^#7fe96e;真菌^reset;包围了。^#green;丰富的有机资源^reset;已探测。
Texts.Eng: This planet seems to be covered in a giant ^#7fe96e;fungal^reset; colony. Abundant ^#green;organic resources^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 这颗奇怪的^#64616f;无光星球^reset;反射所有的阳光，原因不明。^#d16fff;重金属矿石^reset;已探测。
Texts.Eng: This strange ^#64616f;lightless sphere^reset; reflects all sunlight. Reason unknown. ^#c62c7f;Effigium ore^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#83b369;辐射星球。^reset;我想你不该光顾这里，如果你执意登录，那就带好你的^green;辐射防护装备。^reset;^#4444ff;铱矿石^reset;已探测。^cyan;提示：辐射过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: This unusual ^#83b369;irradiated^reset; world should not be visited without ^green;extreme radiation protection^reset;. ^#4444ff;Irradium ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Radiation protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这是颗^#ffc2f9;颜色鲜艳^reset;的星球。似乎有着严重的^orange;放射性环境^reset;。扫描仪已经探测到稀有矿产。^cyan;提示：辐射过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: This unusual planet is ^#ffc2f9;chromatic^reset;, with a ^orange;radioactive atmosphere^reset;. Our scanners detect rare mineral deposits. ^cyan;Recommended: Deadly Radiation protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#914560;超高密度^reset;的星球。^orange;其重力远高于正常水平^reset;。小心行事，^red;坠落意味着死亡！^reset;
Texts.Eng: This unusually ^#914560;super-dense^reset; planet has gravity ^orange;far above normal^reset;. Be very careful. ^red;Falling means certain death^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 这颗星球上覆盖着^#da67b8;奇异海洋^reset;。扫描仪没显示什么有用的信息。
Texts.Eng: This world is covered in a ^#da67b8;strange sea^reset;. Scanners reveal little useful info. ^red;Potentially Lethal!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 一颗^#999999;多岩星球。^reset;崎岖的地形可能会减慢你的速度。
Texts.Eng: Travel may be slower going on this ^#999999;rocky moon^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 踩在这个星球上要小心点，表面有着很多的^#59a849;原始森林^reset;而且该星球，^#cd5d02;火山活动频繁。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Tread carefully on this ^#59a849;primeval forest^reset; world. ^#cd5d02;Heavy volcanic activity^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 挥发性熔岩和极端致命的高温，这里就像个^#cd5d02;地狱。^reset;地下已探测到^#d16fff;重金属矿石。^reset;^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Volatile lava and extreme deadly heat await on ^#cd5d02;infernus^reset; worlds. Protection recommended. ^#d16fff;Densinium ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 挥发性熔岩和极端致命的高温，这里就像个^#cd5d02;地狱。^reset;地下已探测到^#d16fff;重金属矿石。^reset;^cyan;提示：温度过高，注意带上相应保护科技。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Volatile lava and extreme deadly heat await on ^#cd5d02;infernus^reset; worlds. Protection recommended. ^orange;Pyreite Ore^reset; detected. ^cyan;Recommend: Deadly Heat protection^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我决定将这颗星球亲切地称为'生与死的世界'。它真是像极了^#cc8d5a;痛苦之源。^reset;这颗星球让我的肠胃很不舒服。^red;警告:这是个很疯狂的星球。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Lovingly called 'worlds born dead', ^#cc8d5a;atropus^reset; plantets are not for the faint of heart or the weak-stomached. ^red;Warning: Causes Madness^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这是由^e43774;硅酸盐晶体^reset;组成的^#e6c011;月球。^reset;已探测到^#a56caf;月形晶体矿石。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Silicate ^e43774;crystals^reset; such as ^#e6c011;lunari^reset; have been detected on this ^#a56caf;crystalline world^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 阳光很难穿透这颗^#78657f;半影星球^reset;外部大气。该星球拥有丰富的^#9d5bd0;半影矿石^reset;资源。
Texts.Eng: Sunlight rarely penetrates ^#78657f;penumbral^reset; atmospheres. Rich sources of ^#9d5bd0;penumbrite ore^reset; detected.

Texts.Chs: 阳光很少触及这颗^#59a849;黑暗星球。^reset;但不知道为什么，这颗星球的植物很繁茂。
Texts.Eng: Sunlight rarely touches this ^#59a849;dark primeval^reset; world, yet somehow the plant life grows thick and lush.
